document_data.name: Bloodstone Runehammers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bloodstone Runehammers''', also referred to simply as the '''Runehammers''', were a group of [[dwarf|dwarven]] warriors dedicated to protecting the dwarfholds of the [[Kingdom of Bloodstone]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], although their oath survived the fall of that realm.
document_data.Activities: The Runehammers were sworn to defend the various dwarven clans and holds of the [[Bloodstone Lands]] from monsters and other incursions. They were professional [[fighter]]s and [[warlord]]s known for their perceptiveness and dungeoneering skills.
document_data.History:
The Runehammers' duty became increasingly taxing following the overthrow of Bloodstone by the [[Warlock Knights]] of [[Vaasa]], and in particular the Knights' subsequent assault on [[Hillsafar Hall]] and expulsion of [[Clan Orothiar]] from [[Bloodstone Mines]] in the {{YearlinkName|1470}}.

Despite opposing the Warlock Knights, the Runehammers remained active in Vaasa.{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|78}} the Runehammers were party to a plot between [[Clan Hillsafar]] and Clan Orothiar to reclaim Bloodstone Mines.
